FixCleaner seeks to provide easy access to system repair, protection and optimization in one,

To optimize a user's system, FixCleaner features an Active-X manager and a set of step-by-step templates

Used together, these multiple utilities facilitate a better control of a computer's functions and 
better management of its performance.

Install the program
